form.name: nutrition_for_breastfeeding_mothers_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Nutrition For Breastfeeding Mothers> Nutrition For Breastfeeding Mothers TWO

field.name: Counsel mothers to eat a balanced 4-star diet
1 star Staples: grains such as maize, wheat, rice, millet, sorghum, and roots, and tubers such as cassava and potatoes
1 star Legumes: such as beans, lentils, peas, groundnuts, and seeds such as sesame
1 star Vitamin A rich fruits: such as mango, papaya, passion fruit, oranges, banana, pineapple, avocado, watermelon, and tomatoes
Vitamin A rich vegetables: such as dark-green leaves, carrots, yellow sweet potato and pumpkin, eggplant, and cabbage
1 star Animal-source foods: such as meat, chicken, fish, liver, eggs, and dairy products are very important
Oils and fats such as margarine, butter, palm oil, shea butter and other vegetable oils can be used to prepare foods
